topic.fullpath: Topic :: Formats and Protocols :: Data Formats

name: Java Object Notation
short_description: Java Object Notation is an extension to the JSON data format suitable for the serialization of Java objects. The intuitive format and the simple yet extensible library allow both humans and computers to read and write complex object graphs.
